long_description: With a lightweight design that's tough enough for demanding descents, the Bell Super bike helmet offers all-mountain readiness that's well-suited to your enduro and Super-D rides. Mount your GoPro camera (sold separately) on the low-profile integrated GoPro mount; when you're not recording your ride, you can easily remove the mount. Eyewear-friendly design lets you use your preferred optics; adjustable visor can be rotated up to allow goggles to sit comfortably on helmet. Fusion process integrates the foam liner and microshell into a single structure, providing lightweight strength and improving protection from sudden impacts. Internal reinforcement structure and extended coverage over back of head offer added protection. Harness system includes lightweight webbing, cam-lock levers and buckle, helping save weight without hindering adjustability or safety. Fit can be adjusted with one hand with the twist of a dial at the back of the helmet. Bell Super bike helmet features 25 vents, four of which vent directly over your brow. X-static- padding integrates silver fibers into the pads to quickly wick moisture away from your head and combat odors naturally.
